title: PP Rek'Sai recall bug
body: I think it may have been caused by canceling my recall once. Every time I tried to recall for real, she would dive beneath the frog (gromplet?), but then for whatever reason she would revert to her idle burrowed model.

replies.body:
Hey zotheghost,

Do you have the Phasewalker mastery on? If you have anything that shortens the recall time (like Baron), the full animation won't play.

EDIT: Animator says this may have broken - it was originally set up to play regardless. We're looking into it!
